trigger: A lock is locked, unlocked, or jammed
trigger_description: This trigger fires when a lock changes status.

trigger: A device turned on or off
trigger_description: This trigger fires when an INSTEON or Z-Wave device turns on or off.

trigger: A variable is set to a value
trigger_description: This trigger fires when a state or integer variable is set.
This trigger fires when a security area changed state to armed or disarmed.

trigger: A program is true or false
trigger_description: This trigger fires when a program is true or false.

trigger: A sensor turned on or off
trigger_description: This trigger fires when a Motion, Water Leak, TriggerLinc, or Door sensor turns on or off.

trigger: A Z-Wave device is reporting low battery
trigger_description: This trigger fires when any Z-Wave device is reporting 20% or less battery remaining.
